name: SIEGE Demo v1.0
description:
The music for this game was made by my friend PacktionZT :]

(The game may take a moment to load, however if it fails, please consider downloading it)

This game is much more optimized towards the desktop version, so there are a few problems in the web version, please avoid hitting the quit button for now when playing on the web.

WASD : Move Camera

LShift : Increase Camera Movement Speed

Scroll : Zoom In/Out

Space Bar: Toggle Play/Pause

LClick : Place Material

RClick : Clear Selection

Q/E : Rotate Selection

R : Clear Scene

Escape Key: Pause Menu

Arrow Keys : Positive/Negative Actions (Make sure at least one engine is wired up to something)

(When you have the wire selected, first select an engine and then select the pistons you want to connect to it)
